name: File System Consistency Check
description:
Developed for the Global Game Jam 2021 - Theme "Lost and Found"

Some files in your computer seem to have been corrupted. Assist fsck doing its work to repair your files to get them out of the lost+found folder. It looks like the corruption in your system has taken form and can be dangerous, so be careful. Similar to a roguelike, but with bigger characters and hand-crafted levels.

A solo project using Godot for the first time, with zero external libraries and pure code. All draw calls made with "draw_string" with no non-ASCII characters.

Things that I didn't make in time:

  • Sound
  • Fancier text coloring and animations
  • Animation when spawning in
  • More variety on the maps, using the depth view better
